CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 24, 1962, pg. 3 reads: "International Trio - Among participants at the Pittsburgh Council of Negro Women's Brotherhood Food Festival, March 3, at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton, will be this charming trio. Wearing attire of their respective countries, they are, left to right: Mrs. Gladys Davidson, Puerto Rico; Mrs. Shelia Rattan, India, and Miss Mary Li, China. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Gladys Davidson, Shelia Rattan, and Mary Li, wearing ethnic costumes, posed facing mirror in interior, possibly YMCA, to promote Brotherhood Food Festival
